Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Spain to win based on their perfect record in the tournament
Pep Guardiola emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession for Spain
Germany has been exceptional in front of goal, having scored a total of ten goals in the tournament so far
Others: This match is the Euro 2024 Quarterfinal between Spain and Germany
The match is set to take place on July 5, 2024, at the MHPArena in Stuttgart
Both teams are vying for a spot in the semifinals
Spain has a perfect record of nine points in the tournament and has not conceded a goal
Germany finished at the top of Group A with seven points and defeated Denmark 2-0 in the round of 16
